title: Gentle Park Sounds
description: This audio features calming sounds of birdsong and wind rustling through trees. The overall atmosphere is peaceful and relaxing, creating a serene backdrop. It's a pleasant soundscape perfect for unwinding.

title: Car Driving Ambiance
description: This audio features the consistent sound of a car driving on a road. You can hear the engine hum and the low rumble of the tires on the asphalt. It's a continuous sound, creating a calming and slightly hypnotic atmosphere.

title: Exterior Parking Lot with Birds
description: This audio features the sounds of a parking lot, including distant vehicle traffic and the cheerful chirping of birds. It's a relatively peaceful soundscape, not overly intrusive and with a pleasant, natural character. The sounds are mostly continuous.

title: Quiet Fan
description: A gentle, consistent hum of a fan is present. It's a low-level sound that doesn't dominate the audio, creating a sense of calm and quiet. It would be suitable for a home environment.

title: Grocery Store Ambience
description: This audio captures a typical grocery store environment with a mix of sounds: hushed conversations, the gentle hum of refrigerators, and the soft clatter of shopping carts. It's a moderately busy atmosphere, not overly loud, creating a relaxed and familiar soundscape. The sounds are fairly continuous, making it suitable for background ambiance.

title: Office Ambience
description: This audio features a mix of typical office sounds: keyboard clicks, faint conversations, and the hum of office equipment. It's a generally quiet and unobtrusive soundscape, creating a comfortable and focused atmosphere. The sounds are continuous and provide a subtle background.

title: Airport Terminal Activity
description: This audio captures the sounds of a busy airport terminal, with overlapping conversations, rolling suitcases, and the hum of machinery. It's a moderately loud and continuous soundscape, reflecting the constant activity of travelers. The overall mood is bustling and somewhat impersonal.

title: Shopping Mall Ambience
description: This audio captures the typical sounds of a bustling shopping mall. You can hear a mix of muted chatter, distant music, and the faint hum of air conditioning, creating a somewhat busy and lively atmosphere. The overall soundscape feels moderately intrusive.

title: Heavy Manila Traffic
description: This audio captures the sounds of a significant traffic jam in Manila. You can hear a constant low rumble of engines, intermittent honking, and the occasional squealing of brakes. It's a very busy and potentially stressful soundscape.

title: Train Station Ambience
description: This audio captures the typical sounds of a busy train station, including the rumble of trains, announcements, and general chatter. It's a moderately loud soundscape, creating a bustling yet functional atmosphere. The sounds are mostly continuous, contributing to a sense of transit.
